error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'total_days' (value: 280) was used instead of 'target_miles_per_week' (value: 120.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 7
He wants to run 100*0.2=<<100*0.2=20>>20 miles more than he used to
So he needs to run 100+20=<<100+20=120>>120 miles
He is doing this in 280/7=<<280/7=40>>40 weeks
So he needs to add 280/40=<<280/40=7>>7 miles per week
